name: UNITED NATURAL PRODUCTS ALLIANCE
description: Association of dietary supplement and functional food companies
sampleDescriptions: Possible inclusion of SNAP provision covering multivitamin supplements in 2018 Farm Bill (H.R. 3841)
Coverage of multivitamins in Health Savings Act of 2017 (HR 1175/S 403); possible inclusion in PL 115-141, Consolidated Appropriations Act
Adequacy of funding for the Food and Drug Administration (FY 2018 Consolidated Appropriations Act (HR 1605/P.L. 115-141))
Coverage of multivitamins in Health Savings Act of 2017 (HR 1175/S 403)
Adequacy of funding for the Food and Drug Administration (Agriculture appropriations bill)
